entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:21 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 06:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -11.4°C
Wind: NE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
